name: CPTemplate
desc: An abstract base class for interface templates.

items.name: var userInfo: Any?
items.desc: Any custom data or object that you want to associate with the template.

items.name: var tabTitle: String?
items.desc: A short title that describes the content of the tab.

items.name: var tabImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image that represents the content of the tab.

items.name: var tabSystemItem: UITabBarItem.SystemItem
items.desc: A system object that provides a title and image for common tab content, such as contacts or favorites.

items.name: var showsTabBadge: Bool
items.desc: An indicator you use to call attention to the tab.
